Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service.AccountService
@Service public class AccountService extends Object
Service responsible for account management.

      public Account update(Long accountId, Account account)
      Updates an existing account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account to be updated.
      account - The account with the updates.
      Returns:
      The updated account.

    • delete

      @Transactional public boolean delete(Long accountId)
      Deletes an Account by its ID.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the account was deleted, false if it was not found.

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit(Long accountId, Double amount, AccountType type)
      Make a deposit into an account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The account ID.
      amount - The amount to be deposited.
      type - The type of account (FOOD, MEAL, CASH).
      Returns:
      Whether the deposit was successful.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Long accountId, Double amount, AccountType type)
      Make a withdrawal from an account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The account ID.
      amount - The amount to be withdrawn.
      type - The type of account (FOOD, MEAL, CASH).
      Returns:
      Whether the withdrawal was successful.

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(Long fromAccountId, Long toAccountId, Double amount, AccountType type)
      Move balance between accounts.
      Parameters:
      fromAccountId - The source account ID.
      toAccountId - The target account ID.
      amount - The amount to be transferred.
      type - The target account type.
      Returns:
      Whether the transfer was successful.

    • moveBalance

      public boolean moveBalance(Long accountId, Double amount, AccountType fromType, AccountType toType)
      Move balance between account types.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the originating account.
      amount - The amount to be transferred.
      fromType - The source account type.
      toType - The target account type.
      Returns:
      Whether the transfer was successful.

    • fallbackToCash

      private boolean fallbackToCash(Account account, Double amount)

    • hasSufficientBalance

      public boolean hasSufficientBalance(Long id, Double amount, AccountType type)
      Checks whether there is sufficient balance in the specified account type. If there is none, use the CASH balance.
      Parameters:
      id - The account ID.
      amount - The value to check.
      type - The type of account to check.
      Returns:
      Whether there is sufficient balance.
